about.title: Our Story
about.story.p1: Born from family tradition and a love for tea — Hamro Chiya Pasal. What began as a small neighborhood shop is now a favorite community hangout.
about.story.p2: We source directly from Ilam and Dhankuta, balancing tradition and modern taste. Our commitment: authentic Nepali flavor, fair trade, and sustainability.
about.sourcing.title: Tea Sourcing & Regions
about.sourcing.subtitle: Direct farmer relationships • Fair trade practices • Seasonal harvests
about.sourcing.list.1: Seasonal harvest windows with careful hand-plucking

about.region.ilam.blurb: Ilam is Nepal’s tea heartland — known for golden tips, complex aroma, and crisp mornings that shape the leaves.
about.region.dhankuta.blurb: Dhankuta’s rolling hills produce bright, balanced cups with gentle sweetness. We partner with smallholders here.
about.region.kaski.blurb: From the mid-hills around Pokhara, select gardens yield delicate greens with a refreshing finish.
